content.question:
​

Moving clockwise from left, the circle passes through the following points:

(negative 4.8 comma 0)

(0 comma 4.8)

(4.8 comma 0)

(0 comma negative 4.8)

Two points labeled A and B are marked on the circumference of the circle.

Point A is marked at (2.2 comma 4.3).

Point B is marked at (4.8 comma 0).

An angle labeled alpha is drawn between the radius O B and radius O A.

​The figure gives a circle of radius <math alttext="4.8"><semantics><mn>4.8</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane with center at the origin, an angle <math alttext="alpha"><semantics><mi>α</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in standard position, and three labeled points. Which of the following is the value of <math alttext="sin alpha"><semantics><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
